metadata.name: KOKYO NFT −Japan Activity Pass− AMAMI #1
metadata.description:
Be a shochu owner in Japan.  
  
Amami Oshima, an island registered as a UNESCO World Natural Heritage Site, is full of tropical nature and culture. Many tourists have visited this site from all over the world and have been attracted by its azure water sea, white-sand beach, and deep forests.  
But nature is not the only attraction of Amami. The island is locatd between Okinawa and Kagoshima's main land and has developed various cuture on foods, musics, and history. Kokuto Shochu is an essential when you talk about Amami's history.  
  
We wanted this special Shohu only distilled at Amami Oshima to be known to the people all around the world. These thoughts have moved us to produce KOKYO NFT which allows people to become a co-owner of shochu barrels.  
  
Number of units sold: 100 (3 bottles per person)  
Selling price: ¥120,000(Tax Included ¥132,000)/0.6ETH  
*The price of NFT includes the right to distill exclusive shochu as a co-owner, annual tasting, live music and production experience, and the right to receive 3 types of kokuto shochu after 3 years.  
*Additional fee will be charged if you want shochu to be shipped to your home.  
*Please fill out the application form which will be sent to you after your NFT purchase to participate in the Tasting & Music Live.
